full_summary:
# Air Conditioning and Refrigeration Systems Standing Offer

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4264999318-Doc4265029073
* **Publication Date**: October 26, 2023
* **Closing Date and Time**: November 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Scope of Work

The work under this standing offer includes the provision of air conditioning and refrigeration systems maintenance and repair services at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre in St. John's, Terre-Neuve.

## Contact Information

For all technical and contractual inquiries, please contact:
Richard Parsons
Email: richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Important Notes

* All inquiries must be submitted in writing and must be received no less than five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date.
* This tender is open to all qualified bidders.

## Additional Information

For more information, please visit the tender notice on the Ariba website at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17837684?extsite=MTc4Mzc2ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
